name: Isonville Bus Driver Simulator 1
description:
JeeKay Dev Presents new fantastic game called Isonville Bus Driving Simulator 1! In this game, you can imagine of being city bus driver in low poly world. Game is in the early access so please post youre opinion and ideas for my game down below and i'll check this out and maybe add your idea to my game.  Steering:

WASD - Driving

O - opening door (Use this to make the checkpoint when on yellow area).

1 - enable bus headlights.

2 - disable bus headlights.

Short Instruction: 

Follow the red arrow to make checkpoints and go to the last checkpoint on starting point on bus depot.
